snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo put a disappointing World Cup behind him by scoring twice as Real Madrid won the UEFA Super Cup with a 2-0 victory over its Spanish rival Sevilla.
abstract: Cristiano Ronaldo scores twice to drive Real Madrid to victory in UEFA Super Cup, with 2-0 victory over Sevilla in Cardiff, Wales; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo put a disappointing World Cup behind him by scoring twice as Real Madrid won the UEFA Super Cup with a 2-0 victory over its Spanish rival Sevilla.

headline.main: Ronaldo Leads Real Madrid to Trophy
